sentences.cn: 他的解释似乎很不可能.

sentences.en: It is improbable that he will come.
It is improbable that she will go.
It seems improbable that the current situation will continue.
sentences.cn: 当前的局势似乎不大可能继续下去。

sentences.en: It seems improbable that this year's figure will fall much below last year's 75,000.
sentences.cn: 看来今年的数字不大可能比去年的75,000差太多。

sentences.en: It's improbable that she'll accept the invitation.
On the face of it, their marriage seems an improbable alliance.
sentences.cn: 表面上看，他们的婚姻似乎是个荒谬的结合。

sentences.en: Or it could mean one more thing - as improbable, but it was far more sinister plot.
sentences.cn: 再不然就是另一种情况,尽管可能性也不大, 但那却是凶狠毒辣得多的阴谋.

sentences.en: The reporting from our various diplomatic posts converged on the proposition that the war was improbable.
sentences.cn: 我国各驻外使馆所发回的报告都一致认为战争不可能发生.

sentences.en: There is nothing inherently improbable in the idea.
sentences.cn: 这个想法本身没什么不可能的.

sentences.en: These new facts make the theory improbable.
sentences.cn: 这些新出现的事实使这一理论变得荒谬.

sentences.en: We must make one of two following highly improbable suppositions.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不采取下列两种不近情理的假说之一.

sentences.en: What is there so improbable in it?
sentences.cn: 这有什么不大可能的 呢 ?

sentences.en: When the sky is blue , it is improbable that it will rain.
sentences.cn: 当灭空呈蓝色时;不大可能会下雨.

words.tran_cn: 未必有之事；不大可能的事物

trans.tran_cn: 不大可能是真实的，不大可能的，未必确实的，未必会发生的，非概然
